alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 3:29AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FRANKLIN, FAIRFIELD, HOCKING, EASTERN PICKAWAY, DELAWARE, LICKING AND NORTHEASTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 415 AM EST... At 329 AM EST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sunbury to near Kingston, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, half inch hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Newark, Lancaster, Westerville, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Delaware, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Chillicothe, Pickerington, Worthington, Circleville, Bexley, Heath, Logan, Granville, Pataskala, Powell and Canal Winchester. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 96 and 144. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 101 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway; Ross
